org.apache.ambari.server.stack

Class MasterHostResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ambari.server.stack.MasterHostResolver

  • public class MasterHostResolver
extends Object
    Class that determines hosts that are active or standby for services that support HA

        Get the master hostname of the given service and component.
        Parameters:

        componentName - Component
        Returns:

      • isNameNodeHA

        public boolean isNameNodeHA()
                     throws org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException
        Determine if HDFS is present and it has NameNode High Availability.
        Returns:

        org.apache.ambari.server.AmbariException

      • queryJmxBeanValue

        protected String queryJmxBeanValue(String hostname,
                                   int port,
                                   String beanName,
                                   String attributeName,
                                   boolean asQuery)

      • queryJmxBeanValue

        protected String queryJmxBeanValue(String hostname,
                                   int port,
                                   String beanName,
                                   String attributeName,
                                   boolean asQuery,
                                   boolean encrypted)
        Query the JMX attribute at http(s)://$server:$port/jmx?qry=$query or http(s)://$server:$port/jmx?get=$bean::$attribute
        Parameters:
        hostname - host name
        port - port number
        beanName - if asQuery is false, then search for this bean name
        attributeName - if asQuery is false, then search for this attribute name
        asQuery - whether to search bean or query
        encrypted - true if using https instead of http.
        Returns:
        The jmx value.
